title: Stage Lv8-C1-S07
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: While acknowledging the risks, we must proceed if we want to succeed.
Although the task is difficult, we can accomplish it provided we work together.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 위험을 인정하면서도 성공하고 싶다면 우리는 계속 진행해야 합니다.
sentences.en: While acknowledging the risks, we must proceed if we want to succeed.

sentences.kr: 비록 과제가 어렵지만 함께 일한다면 달성할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Although the task is difficult, we can accomplish it provided we work together.

sentences.kr: 도전에도 불구하고 우리가 계속 전념한다면 프로젝트는 성공할 것입니다.
sentences.en: Despite the challenges, the project will succeed as long as we remain committed.

sentences.kr: 시간이 부족하더라도 효율적으로 일한다면 목표를 달성할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Even though time is limited, we can achieve our goal if we work efficiently.

sentences.kr: 비용이 많이 들더라도 품질이 보장된다면 투자할 가치가 있습니다.
sentences.en: While the cost is high, it's worth investing provided the quality is guaranteed.

sentences.kr: 경험이 부족하지만 열심히 배운다면 빠르게 성장할 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Although we lack experience, we can grow rapidly as long as we learn diligently.

sentences.kr: 어려움을 인정하면서도 포기하지 않는다면 결국 해결책을 찾을 것입니다.
sentences.en: While acknowledging the difficulties, we will find a solution provided we don't give up.

sentences.kr: 자원이 한정되어 있지만 창의적으로 접근한다면 좋은 결과를 얻을 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: Despite limited resources, we can achieve good results if we approach creatively.
